name: All That Glitters
description:
Here's something a little different: an interactive poem. You're tasked with finding the pieces of a crime, and all the evidence falls into a line. The more you connect together, the more things start to flow. It's a test of achieving that player experience of discovery with a little bit of flow to it, while creating a new experience by combinding the flow of poetry with gameplay.

This was originally meant for LD37 but...that didn't happen.

Gameplay design, programming and music mixing were all done by me, some models were used from the asset store.

WASD to move, space to interact. Mouse required.
